title: pairing issue
extract: paired; pairing; pairs. Definition of pair (Entry 2 of 2) transitive verb. 1a : to make a pair of —often used with off or up paired off the animals. b : to cause to be a member of a pair.
extract_html: paired; pairing; pairs. Definition of pair (Entry 2 of 2) transitive verb. 1a : to make a pair of —often used with off or up paired off the animals. b : to cause to be a member of a pair.
